tweets.author: NFL Memes
tweets.text: Very classy move by Kirk Cousins and other Falcons players to join the Buccaneers in prayer to get Todd Bowles fired

thread_replies.text: FIRE TODD BOWLES

thread_replies.text: The plan was clean. The escape? Not so much. Midway City doesn’t play fair. Wishlist this 4-player coop heist FPS on Steam today.

thread_replies.author: Albus
thread_replies.text: Fire Todd Bowles immediately…terrible usage of Bucky Irving…terrible clock usage on the last possession…Falcons would have had no time if you run the clock down, instead you throw and stop the clock…then you give up a 1st down when you have falcons at 3rd and 28.

tweets.text: Todd Bowles is just Raheem Morris with a pirate ship.

tweets.author: Jonathan Shields
tweets.text:
Up 14 points in the 4th quarter to a team that has 4 wins 

Falcons have 19 penalties for 125 yards the most by ANY NFL team in 6 years 

Have them to a 3rd and 28 and a 4th and 14 on the final drive 

And still find a way to lose 

If Todd Bowles is employed come Monday it is

tweets.author: Fire Kevin Cash
tweets.text:
Up 7 and your bum QB throws an int? 
Then throws behind Egbuka next posession giving ATL the ball back? 
Banish Mayfield to FA where he belongs
